chunks.cleaned_english_translation: From Gratian, If anyone feels wronged by their metropolitan, they should seek judgment from the diocese's primate or the pope of the universal apostolic Church.
chunks.original_latin:
EX GRATIANO (2 q. 6 et 3 q. 6). Si quis putaverit se a proprio metropolitano gravari
apud primatem dioeceseos, aut penes universalis
apostolicae Ecclesiae papam judicetur.
